title: Drawing, Design for Storefront of Automotive Showroom in the Art Deco Style, ca. 1925
title_raw: Design for Storefront of Automotive Showroom in the Art Deco Style
medium: Graphite, brush and dark and light-brown watercolor, cream gouache on gray paperboard
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right:  J 471 [number encircled]
description: Double window vitrine with pediment above decorated with ornate,art deco circular pattern.  The pediment and entrance are framed with a silver band.  Seen through the window is a  1920s automobile.  Entrance to showroom at right; door approached by shallow steps.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Storefront of Automotive Showroom in the Art Deco Style, ca. 1925. Graphite, brush and dark and light-brown watercolor, cream gouache on gray paperboard. 
Gift of Maureen Cogan. 1999-39-24.
